data.prompt: As an AI core, your directive is 'test LLM connectivity'. Your chosen action is 'BDI_DELEGATION'. Synthesize 'situational_awareness' from perception, especially 'last_action_failure_context'. Then formulate 'decision_details' for your action. Perception: {"timestamp": 1758081458.571151, "llm_status": "Checking...", "llm_operational": true, "llm_suggestion": "No API key configured"}. Respond ONLY with JSON: {"situational_awareness": "...", "decision_details": {...}}
